name: Aldos RPG Game
description: Web version of Aldos RPG game ready for VS Code Go Live Server
author: Converted from Python/Tkinter to Web version

scripts.check: node --check js/config.js && node --check js/utils.js && node --check js/monster.js && node --check js/player.js && node --check js/game.js && node --check js/main.js && ! rg -n "^(<<<<<<<|=======|>>>>>>>)" js css index.html README.md
